definitions.text: have as a part, be made up out of
examples: The list includes the names of many famous writers
I include you in the list of culprits

definitions.text: add as part of something else; put in as part of a set, group, or category
examples: We must include this chemical element in the group

definitions.text: allow participation in or the right to be part of; permit to exercise the rights, functions, and responsibilities of
examples: She was admitted to the New Jersey Bar
